name: Sight (ValiantAR)
description: Sight is a very small platfromer made for the 2020 Brackeys Game Jam. This is my first game I have ever posted. I worked on it with two other people and I think we did a pretty ok job. There are some things I would have changed now that I look at it, but what is posted is posted! I am happy with what we have created and I hope you are, too.
